body_html:
While I agree those are issues with index_select, I believe that the cases you pointed out are more niche than those that are optimized by using index_select in general.

I'd vote for keeping the optimized version for v0.4, and try to more cleanly fix the performance regression later on
body_text:
While I agree those are issues with index_select, I believe that the cases you pointed out are more niche than those that are optimized by using index_select in general.
I'd vote for keeping the optimized version for v0.4, and try to more cleanly fix the performance regression later on
body:
While I agree those are issues with `index_select`, I believe that the cases you pointed out are more niche than those that are optimized by using `index_select` in general.

I'd vote for keeping the optimized version for v0.4, and try to more cleanly fix the performance regression later on
